        given: ['Client exists'],
        when: ['User schedules job'],
        then: ['Job is created with status SCHEDULED'],
      },

    examples: [
      {
        key: 'schedule-repair',
        input: {
          clientId: 'client-123',
          date: '2025-01-20T10:00:00Z',
          type: 'repair',
